00026 #ifndef CLIENTREF_H
00027 #define CLIENTREF_H
00028 
00029 //
00030 // Clients are stored in many places. To prevent problems when a client gets deleted
00031 // and later a pointer to a deleted client is referenced, clients are now stored in 
00032 // this class only. It uses reference counting in the client which deletes the client only 
00033 // after the last reference has been unlinked.
00034 // Also the class is used as abstraction layer for the CUpDownClient class.
00035 //
00036 
00037 #include <list>
00038 #include <set>
00039 #include "Types.h"
00040 
00041 class CUpDownClient;
00042 class CKnownFile;
00043 class CPartFile;
00044 class CFriend;
00045 class BitVector;
00046 class CMD4Hash;
00047 
00048 #ifdef __DEBUG__
00049 #define DEBUG_ZOMBIE_CLIENTS
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #ifdef DEBUG_ZOMBIE_CLIENTS
00053 #define LINKED_FROM , wxString from
00054 #define CLIENT_DEBUGSTRING(a) , wxT(a)
00055 #define CCLIENTREF(a, b) CClientRef(a, b)
00056 #else
00057 #define LINKED_FROM
00058 #define CLIENT_DEBUGSTRING(a)
00059 #define CCLIENTREF(a, b) CClientRef(a)
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 class CClientRef {
00063 
00064     CUpDownClient * m_client;
00065 #ifdef DEBUG_ZOMBIE_CLIENTS
00066     wxString    m_from;
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 public:
00070     CClientRef()    { m_client = NULL; }
00071     CClientRef(const CClientRef&);
00072     CClientRef(CUpDownClient * client LINKED_FROM);
00073     CClientRef(class CEC_UpDownClient_Tag *);
00074     ~CClientRef()   { Unlink(); }
00075     CClientRef& operator = (const CClientRef& ref)
00076     {
00077 #ifdef DEBUG_ZOMBIE_CLIENTS
00078         m_from = wxT("assigned from ") + ref.m_from;
00079         Link(ref.m_client, m_from); 
00080 #else
00081         Link(ref.m_client); 
00082 #endif
00083         return *this; 
00084     }
00085 
00086 
00087 // For sets and maps
00088     bool operator <  (const CClientRef & other) const { return m_client < other.m_client; }
00089     bool operator == (const CClientRef & other) const { return m_client == other.m_client; }
00090     bool operator != (const CClientRef & other) const { return m_client != other.m_client; }
00091 
00092     void swap(CClientRef & other)
00093     {
00094         CUpDownClient * c = m_client;
00095         m_client = other.m_client;
00096         other.m_client = c;
00097 #ifdef DEBUG_ZOMBIE_CLIENTS
00098         m_from.swap(other.m_from);
00099 #endif
00100     }
00101 
00102     void Link(CUpDownClient * client LINKED_FROM);
00103     void Unlink();
00104     bool IsLinked() const       { return m_client != NULL; }
00105 
00106     // Return client, no matter if it was deleted
00107     CUpDownClient * GetClient() const   { return m_client; }
00108     // Check if client was deleted, if yes unlink and return zero
00109     CUpDownClient * GetClientChecked();
00110     // Check if client was deleted, if yes unlink
00111     CClientRef&     GetRef();
00112 
00113     void Safe_Delete();
00114 
00115 // Wrapper methods
00116     void                ClearUploadFileID() const;      // only wrapper const
00117     uint32              ECID() const;
00118     bool                ExtProtocolAvailable() const;
00119     uint16              GetAvailablePartCount() const;
00120     const wxString&     GetClientFilename() const;
00121     const wxString&     GetClientModString() const;
00122     const wxString&     GetClientOSInfo() const;
00123     uint8               GetClientSoft() const;
00124     const wxString&     GetClientVerString() const;
00125     uint64              GetDownloadedTotal() const;
00126     uint8               GetDownloadState() const;
00127     CFriend*            GetFriend() const;
00128     bool                GetFriendSlot() const;
00129     wxString            GetFullIP() const;
00130     uint16              GetKadPort() const;
00131     float               GetKBpsDown() const;
00132     uint32              GetIP() const;
00133     uint16              GetLastDownloadingPart() const;
00134     uint16              GetNextRequestedPart() const;
00135     uint8               GetObfuscationStatus() const;
00136     uint16              GetOldRemoteQueueRank() const;
00137     const BitVector&    GetPartStatus() const;
00138     uint16              GetRemoteQueueRank() const;
00139     CPartFile*          GetRequestFile() const;
00140     uint32              GetScore() const;
00141     double              GetScoreRatio() const;
00142     uint32              GetServerIP() const;
00143     const wxString      GetServerName() const;
00144     uint16              GetServerPort() const;
00145     const wxString&     GetSoftStr() const;
00146     const wxString&     GetSoftVerStr() const;
00147     int                 GetSourceFrom() const;  // ESourceFrom
00148     wxString            GetSecureIdentTextStatus() const;
00149     uint64              GetTransferredDown() const;
00150     uint64              GetTransferredUp() const;
00151     uint16              GetUDPPort() const;
00152     uint32              GetUploadDatarate() const;
00153     uint64              GetUploadedTotal() const;
00154     const CKnownFile*   GetUploadFile() const;
00155     uint16              GetUploadQueueWaitingPosition() const;
00156     uint8               GetUploadState() const;
00157     size_t              GetUpPartCount() const;
00158     const CMD4Hash&     GetUserHash() const;
00159     uint32              GetUserIDHybrid() const;
00160     const wxString&     GetUserName() const;
00161     uint16_t            GetUserPort() const;
00162     uint32              GetVersion() const;
00163     bool                HasDisabledSharedFiles() const;
00164     bool                HasLowID() const;
00165     bool                IsBadGuy() const;
00166     bool                IsFriend() const;
00167     bool                IsIdentified() const;
00168     bool                IsRemoteQueueFull() const;
00169     bool                IsUpPartAvailable(uint16 iPart) const;
00170     void                RequestSharedFileList() const;
00171     void                SetCommentDirty(bool bDirty = true) const;      // only wrapper const
00172     void                SetFriend(CFriend* newfriend) const;            // only wrapper const
00173     void                SetFriendSlot(bool bNV) const;                  // only wrapper const
00174     bool                SwapToAnotherFile(bool bIgnoreNoNeeded, bool ignoreSuspensions, bool bRemoveCompletely, CPartFile* toFile = NULL) const;    // only wrapper const
00175 
00176 };
00177 
00178 // efficient std::swap for it
00179 namespace std
00180 {
00181     template<> inline void swap(CClientRef& a, CClientRef& b)
00182     {
00183         a.swap(b);
00184     }
00185 }

00188 typedef std::list<CClientRef> CClientRefList;
00189 typedef std::set<CClientRef>  CClientRefSet;
